create.title: Create an Excursion
create.description: The excursion builder allows you to create a set of tourist attractions in Belarus. It provides a visual route display, time and distance calculation, automatic optimization functionality, and export to a navigator.

edit.title: Edit Excursion
edit.description: The excursion builder allows you to create a set of tourist attractions in Belarus. It provides a visual route display, time and distance calculation, automatic optimization functionality, and export to a navigator.

search.title: Self-Guided Tours in Belarus: Catalog of Routes, Attractions, Maps
search.description: Discover Belarus independently! Complete catalog of walking and driving tours with detailed routes, attraction descriptions, and practical tips. Download ready-to-use GPS tracks and maps for your journey!

form.title: Title
form.placeDescriptionPlaceholder: Share a brief description of the place within the excursion...
form.durationSelect: Enter time for visiting the excursion:

create.success: The excursion has been created and submitted for moderation. You can check its status in your personal account.

update.success: The excursion has been updated and submitted for moderation. You can check its status in your personal account.
